ThingDef.label: punk samurai jacket
ThingDef.description: A specially-made jacket with a samurai logo etched in the back. Wearing this jacket would slightly increase their movespeed, and their ability in dodging melee attacks.

ThingDef.label: sleeveless trench coat
ThingDef.description: A sleeveless trench coat that is practical in both work related tasks and combat. Though in the matter of defensive capabilities is slightly weaker, but its benificial stats makes it a worthwhile investment for long term habitation throughout the rim.

ThingDef.label: spiked waist coat
ThingDef.description: A waist coat with spiked shoulder pads on each sides. Besides looking stylish as hell, it can also enhance the wearer's proficientcy in ranged weapons.

ThingDef.label: punk jacket
ThingDef.description: A jacket worn by mercenaries and bounty hunters alike. This jacket provides decent armor coverage and a decent protection from the elements. Now available in different colors to choose from.

ThingDef.label: rebels waist coat
ThingDef.description: A stylish waist coat commonly worn by urbworld bikers. Its design allows the wearer to feel the wind in their arms and allows for ease of movement for riding motorcycles. Now available in different colors to choose from.

ThingDef.label: combatweave jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: An advanced techwear jumpsuit fit for combat. Made from supersteel thread in a minimum amount that assures optimal level of protection for the wearer, and a built-in mk2 combat stimulant reinforced with fiber optics that stimulates the wearer's nerves and nerve vains for increased combat abilities.

ThingDef.label: techwear bodysuit
ThingDef.description: Techwear bodysuit made specifically for optimal heat insulation.

ThingDef.label: techwear jacket neon pink
ThingDef.description: Techwear jacket which provides the wearer a significant boost in intellectual and social tasks.

ThingDef.label: techwear jacket neon blue
ThingDef.description: Techwear jacket which provides the wearer a boost in medical and production tasks.

ThingDef.label: techwear jacket neon yellow
ThingDef.description: Techwear jacket which provides the wearer a boost in construction-related tasks.

ThingDef.label: techwear parka
ThingDef.description: A specially-made parka with a built-in electric heater which keeps the wearer warm and comfortable even in the worst cold weather.

ThingDef.label: techwear duster
ThingDef.description: A specially-made duster with a built-in electric cooler which keeps the wearer cool and comfortable even in the worst hot weather.

ThingDef.label: techwear reinforced duster
ThingDef.description: A specially-made duster made of supersteel thread. It possess the same function as the techwear duster, the only difference is that it can offer better protection than the original.

ThingDef.label: assassin visor
ThingDef.description: A state of the art visor meant for efficient takedowns in the dark. It can also make the wearer well proficient in melee combat.

ThingDef.label: cyber glasses "GreenThumb"
ThingDef.description: A state of the art visor glassess for aspiring farmers, where a sub-persona AI provides the wearer with practical knowledge about plants, improving their proficientcy in farming.

ThingDef.label: cyber glassess "BuilderBo"
ThingDef.description: A state of the art visor glassess for passionate and aspiring builders, where a sub-persona AI provides the wearer with ancient carpenter knowledge from a world renowned builder "Builder Bo", improving their proficientcy in construction.

ThingDef.label: cyber glassess "Rambo"
ThingDef.description: A state of the art visor glassess for those trigger happy gunslingers, where a sub-persona AI aid the wearer in reducing ranged cooldown and aiming delay on ranged weapons.

ThingDef.label: cyber glassess "Medic"
ThingDef.description: A state of the art visor glassess for medics, in which a sub persona AI provides medical knowledge on-the-go for the wearer using the ancient knowledge of WEB MD, making them a somewhat proficient medic.

ThingDef.label: neon blue gasmask
ThingDef.description: An improved gasmask with an increased efficientcy in filtering toxic fumes.

ThingDef.label: reinforced neon blue gasmask
ThingDef.description: An improved gasmask with an increased efficientcy in filtering toxic fumes, now available with a protective screen.

ThingDef.label: miners gasmask
ThingDef.description: A gasmask made specifically for miners in urbworld coal mines. This gasmask has a built-in mineral deposit scanner that boosts the wearer's mining yield, and slightly boost their mining speed, definitely a must have apparel for those who wants more minerals in their storage.

ThingDef.label: neon blue mask helmet
ThingDef.description: An aesthetic-looking headgear that offers complete immunity to toxic fallout, and can turn anyone into a medical whiz in an instant.

ThingDef.label: neon red mask helmet
ThingDef.description: An aesthetic-looking headgear that offers complete immunity to toxic fallout, and can turn anyone into a veteran researcher in an instant. It can also raise their social skill at the same time.

ThingDef.label: neon yellow mask helmet
ThingDef.description: An aesthetic-looking headgear that offers complete immunity to toxic fallout, and can turn anyone into an expert builder.

ThingDef.label: strider shoes "neon blue"
ThingDef.description: High-tech sketchers made with the finest materials that offers optimal comfort and slight mobility. Now available in neon blue aesthetics.

ThingDef.label: strider shoes "neon yellow"
ThingDef.description: High-tech sketchers made with the finest materials that offers optimal comfort and slight mobility. Now available in neon yellow aesthetics.

ThingDef.label: strider shoes "neon pink"
ThingDef.description: High-tech sketchers made with the finest materials that offers optimal comfort and slight mobility. Now available in neon pink aesthetics.

ThingDef.label: tactical gloves
ThingDef.description: A stylish fingerless gloves with a hard knuckle. Wearing it would slightly decrease aiming delay.

ThingDef.label: shock gloves
ThingDef.description: Hi-tech fingerless gloves designed for self defense. Using uranium as ammunition, the wearer can fire a shock projectile that can burn organic individuals and disable electronics and mechanoids with its EMP property.

ThingDef.label: traveler's jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: A standard jumpsuit fit for traveling. It provides minimal amount of comfort and few work related bonuses along with a pleasant feeling that soothe the nerves. A recommended apparel for long term expeditions throughout the rim.

ThingDef.label: reinforced jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: A reinforced jumpsuit that provides slight armor rating compared to other jumpsuits, along with a slight bonus to move speed and consciousness.

ThingDef.label: utility jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: A utility jumpsuit that provides slight production related bonuses and carry capacity, but provides minimum protection.
